00022 #include "calvin_files/parsers/src/GridControlFileReader.h"

00025 using namespace std;
00026 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_io;
00027 using namespace affymetrix_grid_control;
00028 using namespace affymetrix_calvin_utilities;
00029 
00030 #define TEST_FILE_NAME "../data/test.file.grc"
00031 
00032 CPPUNIT_TEST_SUITE_REGISTRATION( GridControlFileReaderTest );
00033 
00034 void GridControlFileReaderTest::setUp()
00035 {
00036 }
00037 
00038 void GridControlFileReaderTest::tearDown()
00039 {
00040 }
00041 
00042 void GridControlFileReaderTest::testCreation()
00043 {
00044         GridControlFileReader *reader = new GridControlFileReader;
00045         CPPUNIT_ASSERT ( reader != NULL );
00046         delete reader;
00047 }
00048 
00049 void GridControlFileReaderTest::testRead()
00050 {
00051         GridControlFileReader reader;
00052         GridControlData data;
00053 
00054         reader.Read(TEST_FILE_NAME, data);
00055 
00056         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetRows() == 5);
00057         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetColumns() == 5);
00058         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetNumB1Probes() == 3);
00059         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetNumB2Probes() == 2);
00060         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetNumNSProbes() == 1);
00061 
00062         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetB1(0).x == 0);
00063         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetB1(0).y == 1);
00064         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetB1(1).x == 2);
00065         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetB1(1).y == 3);
00066         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetB1(2).x == 4);
00067         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetB1(2).y == 5);
00068 
00069         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetB2(0).x == 10);
00070         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetB2(0).y == 11);
00071         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetB2(1).x == 12);
00072         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetB2(1).y == 13);
00073 
00074         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetNS(0).x == 10);
00075         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetNS(0).y == 20);
00076 }
00077 
00078 void GridControlFileReaderTest::testRead_no_file()
00079 {
00080         GridControlFileReader reader;
00081         GridControlData data;
00082 
00083         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_THROW(reader.Read("no_file.grc", data), affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::FileNotFoundException);
00084 }
00085 
00086 void GridControlFileReaderTest::testRead_invalid_file_version()
00087 {
00088         GridControlFileReader reader;
00089         GridControlData data;
00090 
00091         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_THROW(reader.Read("../data/test.file.data_invalid_version", data), affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::InvalidVersionException);
00092 }
00093 
00094 void GridControlFileReaderTest::testRead_invalid_file_type()
00095 {
00096         GridControlFileReader reader;
00097         GridControlData data;
00098 
00099         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_THROW(reader.Read("../data/test.file.full_array_file", data), affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::InvalidFileTypeException);
00100 }
